edge_1: In a poker game, Bond wins Dimitrios's vintage Aston Martin in Miami.
edge_2: Le Chiffre organizes a Texas hold 'em tournament at the Casino Royale in Montenegro and Bond is sent by MI6 to play against him, believing a defeat will force Le Chiffre to seek asylum with the British government in exchange for information on his clients.

edge_1: In a poker game, Bond wins Dimitrios's vintage Aston Martin in Miami.
edge_2: Bond is paired with Vesper Lynd, a British Treasury agent overseeing the $10 million buy-in.

edge_1: Le Chiffre organizes a Texas hold 'em tournament at the Casino Royale in Montenegro and Bond is sent by MI6 to play against him, believing a defeat will force Le Chiffre to seek asylum with the British government in exchange for information on his clients.
edge_2: Mr. White introduces Steven Obanno, a high-ranking member of the Lord's Resistance Army, to Le Chiffre in Uganda.

edge_1: Le Chiffre organizes a Texas hold 'em tournament at the Casino Royale in Montenegro and Bond is sent by MI6 to play against him, believing a defeat will force Le Chiffre to seek asylum with the British government in exchange for information on his clients.
edge_2: Using knowledge of his upcoming terrorist attack on aerospace manufacturer Skyfleet, Le Chiffre shorts the company's stock.

edge_1: Le Chiffre organizes a Texas hold 'em tournament at the Casino Royale in Montenegro and Bond is sent by MI6 to play against him, believing a defeat will force Le Chiffre to seek asylum with the British government in exchange for information on his clients.

edge_1: Le Chiffre organizes a Texas hold 'em tournament at the Casino Royale in Montenegro and Bond is sent by MI6 to play against him, believing a defeat will force Le Chiffre to seek asylum with the British government in exchange for information on his clients.
edge_2: Fellow player and CIA agent Felix Leiter stakes Bond the money to let the CIA take Le Chiffre into custody.
